snippet: The mummies, zombies and things that go bump in the night were out in full force at Gavin Brown's opening for the artists Jonathan Horowitz and Rob Pruitt at his space up in Harlem.
abstract: The mummies, zombies and things that go bump in the night were out in full force at Gavin Brown's opening for the artists Jonathan Horowitz and Rob Pruitt at his space up in Harlem.
